content: 21 below the first of any set of 2sc of white 23 chain 1 single_crochet into same st as chain and into the next st slip_stitch into the next 3 st repeat this *2 single_crochet 3 slip_stitch* all the way around slip_stitch to join to the first single_crochet fo weave in ends eyes make 2 - 4 5mm hook worked in the round start with black 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring switch to white 2 increase single_crochet around 9 3 increase single_crochet x2 around 12 4 single_crochet around 12 slip_stitch into next st fo leave long tail for sewing esca the lure 4 5mm hook worked in the round start with yellow 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 9 3 single_crochet around 9 switch to lighter shade of blue 4 single_crochet around 9 5 decrease single_crochet around 6 stuff the bulb here it will be easier before the stem is finished 6-10 single_crochet around 6 11 half_double_crochet increase into the first 3 st single_crochet into the next 3 st 9 slip_stitch into next st fo leave tail for sewing dorsal back fin - 4 5mm hook lighter shade of blue 1 chain 11 single_crochet x10 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet x10 chain 1 turn 3 slip_stitch into first single_crochet chain 6 slip_stitch 5 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 7 slip_stitch 6 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 8 slip_stitch 7 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 9 slip_stitch 8 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 10 slip_stitch 9 back down the chain slip_stitch into next single_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch 3 back down the chain slip_stitch back into same single_crochet slip_stitch down the side & fo leave a longer tail for sewing weave in the short end pectoral side fins - make 2 4 5mm hook in lighter shade of blue 1 chain 5 single_crochet 4 chain 1 turn 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase chain 1 turn 6 3 increase single_crochet x4 increase chain 1 turn 8 4 single_crochet across turn 8 5 *chain 5 slip_stitch 4 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet* repeat between * * three more times after the 4th spine you will only have 1 single_crochet to slip_stitch back into then slip_stitch 4 times down the side & fo leave a tail for sewing weave in the short end caudal tail fin - 4 5mm hook lighter shade of blue chain at beginning of round does not count as 1st stitch 1 chain 10 slip_stitch to join to make a loop 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet x10 slip_stitch to join 3 chain 2 dcinc double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 15 4 chain 2 dcinc double_crochet x2 around slip_stitch to join 20 5 chain 2 dcinc double_crochet x3 around slip_stitch to join 25 6 *chain 7 slip_stitch 6 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 3 single_crochet* repeat between * * 8 times after the 9th
